## Description {#details}

A live range for subregisters.

The LaneMask specifies which parts of the super register are covered by the interval. (
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo/#a7a23b6fb3b79b0c2bf4bf4f0cb042840">TargetRegisterInfo::getSubRegIndexLaneMask()</a>).
</SectionUser>

Definition at line 694 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveinterval-h">LiveInterval.h</a>.
